doc:
Edwin Hodge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edwin_Hodge 0 Edwin Martel Basil Hodge (born January 26, 1985) is an American actor He is recognized for portraying Dante Bishop in The Purge film series, and is the only actor to appear in all of the first three films. Edwin_Martel_Basil_Hodge ( born January_26_,_1985 ) is an_American_actor He is_recognized for portraying Dante_Bishop in The_Purge_film_series , and is the_only_actor to_appear in all of the_first_three_films .
